topic.title: Two more entries in function Next Untranslated Segment

body.p:
Within the translation editor, translators can jump to the next untranslated segment, and this function received two more options:
Next untranslated segment with GLOBAL MEMORY match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, for which a Global Memory match (aka HAMSTER match) is found. Other untranslated segments are ignored.
Next untranslated segment with MT match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, for which an Machine Translation match is found. Other untranslated segments are ignored.

The default hot-key assigned for Next Untranslated Segment => Any is still Alt+n. However, users can assign their own hotkeys for With EXACT match, With FUZZY match, With NO match, With GLOBAL MEMORY match and With MT match using the function Options => Keys... (see page ).
